other_tests.findings: Mixed myopathic and neuropathic motility disorder, with low amplitude contractions and a lack of motor migrating complexes.
Very similar motility pattern to that of the older brother.
Hypertrophy of the muscularis mucosa and lamina propria, mucosal atrophy, and normal ganglion cells in the small and remnant large intestine.
Expansions of short tandem repeats were identified.
Analysis performed using specific antibodies against ACTG2, neurofilament, and smooth muscle actin Î±12 (ACTA2).
